system.availability: Extremely Rare Availability from Dark Eldar Settlement, may not be acquirable elsewhere. When Consumed, gain 1d10 Pain Tokens and 1d10 Corruption. Cannot benefit from drug again for 1 hour. 8 Pain tokens can be used for temp fate point (can't burn). Lasts 50+2d10 Minutes, causes 1d5 Corruption. Can only use one Eldar Drug at a time.
system.cost: Non-Eldar make -20 Toughness Test or are stunned for 1d5 Rounds, if 4+ DoF also take 1d10 Damage (ignore armour+toughness). Eldar make test if taking multiple Eldar drugs.
